page.title: 03A DAY IN THE LIFE OF RACHEL
page.content: After breakfast my first job is feed my rabbit.Then I do my piano practice for 15 to 30 minutes.My mum then goes down to the village post office to buy food and pay for the local paper,The Citizen.My dad goes for a walk with our dog,Jess across the fields nearby. Usually on a Saturday my mum and I go to a nearby town,Ledbury,to shop.She gets her groceries from Gateway,a big supermarket.After lunch I go and play with my friend,Sarah,nextdoor.We draw or play in the garden.I have an early tea of cake,sandwiches and crisps so I have plenty of time to go to my tennis lesson at 6.00.I come back from my lesson at 7.00 and watch television until I go to bed.
